languages.text: "Простите мою дерзость, леди Кассия. Я засмотрелся на ваши глаза и совершенно забыл вопрос".

traits.locale_text: "Простите мою дерзость, леди Кассия. Я засмотрел{mf|ся|ась} на ваши глаза и совершенно забыл{mf||а} вопрос".

languages.text: "Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."
languages.original_text: "Простите мою дерзость, леди Кассия. Я засмотрелся на ваши глаза и совершенно забыл вопрос".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking at your eyes and completely forgot your question."
"Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking at your eyes and completely forgot your question."
"Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."
"Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."
"Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."

languages.text: “请原谅我的冒失，卡西娅女士。我刚刚全神贯注地看着你的双眼，完全忘记了你的问题。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我的冒失，卡西娅女士。我刚刚全神贯注地看着你的双眼，完全忘记了你的问题。”

languages.text: «Perdone mi temeridad, lady Cassia. Estaba mirándole a los ojos y se me ha olvidado completamente la pregunta».
languages.original_text: "Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."

traits.locale_text: «Perdone mi temeridad, lady Cassia. Estaba mirándole a los ojos y se me ha olvidado completamente la pregunta».

languages.text: 「私の軽挙を許してくれ、カシア殿。その目を見ていたら、質問をすっかり忘れてしまっていた」
languages.original_text: "Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."

traits.locale_text: 「私の軽挙を許してくれ、カシア殿。その目を見ていたら、質問をすっかり忘れてしまっていた」

languages.text: "Verzeiht meine Unbesonnenheit, Lady Cassia. Ich blickte in Eure Augen und vergaß vollständig Eure Frage."
languages.original_text: "Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht meine Unbesonnenheit, Lady Cassia. Ich blickte in Eure Augen und vergaß vollständig Eure Frage."

languages.text: « Pardonnez ma témérité, dame Cassia, mais j'étais tellement {mf|absorbé|absorbée} par l'intensité de votre regard que j'en ai oublié votre question. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez ma témérité, dame Cassia, mais j'étais tellement {mf|absorbé|absorbée} par l'intensité de votre regard que j'en ai oublié votre question. »

languages.text: "Küstahlığımın kusuruna bakma Leydi Cassia. Gözlerine bakarken sorduğun soruyu tamamen unuttum."
languages.original_text: "Forgive my temerity, Lady Cassia. I was looking into your eyes and completely forgot your question."

traits.locale_text: "Küstahlığımın kusuruna bakma Leydi Cassia. Gözlerine bakarken sorduğun soruyu tamamen unuttum."
